

/**************

DOCUMENTATION OF THE LINKED LISTS < > 1.12

**************/



import java.util.LinkedList;

public class MyClass {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub

        LinkedList < Character > myList = new LinkedList < Character >();

        myList.add(0, 'P');

        myList.add(1, 'A');

        myList.add(2, 'T');

        myList.add(3, 'R');

        myList.add(4, 'I');

        myList.add(5, 'C');

        myList.add(6, 'K');

        for ( Character myName: myList)
            System.out.println(myName);

        System.out.println("The size of the List is " + myList.size());

        myList.addFirst('/');

        myList.addLast('\\');

        for ( Character myName: myList)
            System.out.println(myName);

        System.out.println("The size of the List is " + myList.size());

        System.out.println("Hello \rPATRICK");




    }

}



P
A
T
R
I
C
K

The size of the List is 7

/
P
A
T
R
I
C
K
\

The size of the List is 9

PATRICK
